meanings.definition: The process of adding moisture to the air.
meanings.sent1: Humidification helps keep the air moist.
meanings.sent2: The humidification of the room made it more comfortable.
meanings.sent3: The humidification of the desert would turn it into a rainforest!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like a humidification of joy.
meanings.sent5: The humidification of the plants was essential for their growth.

meanings.definition: The act of making something humid.
meanings.sent1: Proper humidification prevents dryness in the air.
meanings.sent2: The humidification of the basement caused mold to grow.
meanings.sent3: The humidification of the cake made it too moist to eat!
meanings.sent4: His words were like a humidification of tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The humidification of the bathroom mirrors showed how steamy the shower was.
